data.name: Light
data.detailed_description:
What is the general plot of the game
Roughly narrate the story of the Syrian beach boy escaping from his inner world.

What kind of work is this
The game is a silent black-and-white anti war game. It is a 2D puzzle game without text introduction.

How long and difficult is the game
The game itself needs two hours to pass the customs as soon as it knows all the puzzle solving methods, and new players need four hours or more as soon as possible. The difficulty of the game is relatively simple, which is slightly simpler than inside, and the length of the game is similar.

How is the game played
The game uses WASD mobile on the keyboard, R_ CTRL interaction, f turn on flashlight. When a player encounters a specific NPC in the game, he can press f to control the NPC to help him pass the level. When a player encounters a specific level in the game, he can press f to obtain a pause time, blink and time reversal. Note: these playing methods will appear at specific levels, which are closely combined with the plot.

Game maker
This game is made by myself independently, which is a personal game dream. If I can get your play, I will feel very honored,

If you don't like this game, what should you do?
You can post bad comments in the steam comment area and submit a refund application to steam customer service

data.short_description: The protagonist is to commemorate the Syrian boy on the beach, control the character to escape and solve mysteries in my fictional inner world, understand the worldview of the game and the cruelty of past wars during this period, and finally make their own real choices.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, Radeon R9-270
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
